thread.title: Leeds mosque opens its doors to visitors | Calendar
thread.title_full: Leeds mosque opens its doors to visitors | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Leeds mosque opens its doors to visitors | Calendar
text:
Play video Video report by Lisa Adlam Leeds Grand Mosque has opened its doors to visitors from all walks of life, in a bid to alleviate misconceptions about Islam.
The Mosque was one of 150 nationwide which took part in 'Visit My Mosque Day' on Sunday, with the aim of spreading the message of peace and unity.
Visitors were given guided tours, free refreshments, Islamic literature, and a chance to observe prayer in the mosque.
Last updated Mon 6 Feb 2017 Leeds West Yorkshire
